title: An Act authorizing the commissioner of Capital Asset Management and Maintenance to convey a certain parcel of land in the town of Tewksbury

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Robertson of Tewksbury, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 3408) of David Allen Robertson relative to authorizing the commissioner of Capital Asset Management and Maintenance to convey a certain parcel of land in the town of Tewksbury.  State Administration and Regulatory Oversight.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight

related_entities.name: committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 04/09/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-2
Reporting date extended to Wednesday, December 3, 2025
Accompanied a new draft, see H4823
